title: "there is more to life than helvetica"
author: Joostmarcellis

comments.content: Nice use of ecofont for the middle "L" that will save some ink.

@sii hahahah good one,

i forgot to mention this shirt is made by [http://www.behance.net/ShirleyAnnDick](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415194156/http:/www.behance.net/ShirleyAnnDick "http://www.behance.net/ShirleyAnnDick") and i placed it here to show my support, helvetica has been overkilled in design, i consider it an easy way out

The only thing not up to snuff on that tee is L in Helvetica—it looks like an S.

Nice anywayz tho... :-)
as far as i understand it is generated ramdomly, so your bound to get some weird combinations
